name: divorce
content:
divorce noun
(PEOPLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 [ C or U ] an official or legal process to end a marriage: The last I heard they were getting a divorce. Divorce is on the increase. Ellie wants a divorce. What are the chances of a marriage ending in divorce?
More examplesFewer examplesI'm sure my views on marriage are coloured by my parents' divorce.She came out of the divorce settlement a rich woman.Her mind flashed back to the day of their divorce.One common cause of homelessness is separation or divorce.In spite of the divorce there was no awkwardness between them - in fact they seemed very much at ease.
